projects.name: Lelapa AI
projects.description: Building African language models and NLP tools to bridge the language gap in AI technology across Africa.

projects.name: InstaDeep
projects.description: AI-powered decision-making for enterprises, specializing in reinforcement learning and optimization.

projects.name: Zindi
projects.description: Africa's largest data science competition platform, connecting African data scientists with organizations.

projects.name: Hausa NLP
projects.description: Open-source project focused on developing NLP tools and resources for the Hausa language.

projects.name: Awarri
projects.description: AI-powered language learning platform for African languages with speech recognition.

projects.name: AIgents
projects.description: Building conversational AI agents for African businesses and government services.

projects.name: Amini
projects.description: Satellite data and AI platform providing environmental insights for African agriculture.

projects.name: LifeQ
projects.description: Digital health platform using AI for personalized health insights from wearable data.

projects.name: Chowdeck AI
projects.description: Using computer vision and ML for food delivery optimization in Lagos.

projects.name: Wazobia LLM
projects.description: Large language model trained on Nigerian languages: Hausa, Yoruba, and Igbo (Pidgin).

projects.name: Ubenwa
projects.description: AI-powered diagnostic tool analyzing infant cries to detect birth asphyxia and neurological issues.

projects.name: Savannah AI
projects.description: Computer vision platform for wildlife conservation and anti-poaching efforts across Africa.

graveyard.name: AfriVoice AI
graveyard.description: Voice assistant for African languages. Shut down due to lack of funding and technical challenges.
graveyard.reasonForClosure: Funding dried up after initial seed round. Technical challenges with accent recognition proved too expensive to solve.
graveyard.lessonLearned: Underestimated the complexity and cost of African language voice recognition. Should have focused on one language first.

graveyard.name: SmartFarm Analytics
graveyard.description: AI platform for smallholder farmers providing crop yield predictions.
graveyard.reasonForClosure: Poor product-market fit. Farmers couldn't afford subscriptions and free model wasn't sustainable.
graveyard.lessonLearned: Target market (smallholder farmers) had no ability to pay. Should have targeted agricultural cooperatives or government programs instead.

graveyard.name: EduBot Africa
graveyard.description: AI tutoring chatbot for high school students across Africa.
graveyard.reasonForClosure: Team disbanded after co-founder conflict. Product was gaining traction but couldn't survive leadership crisis.
graveyard.lessonLearned: Don't start a company with friends without clear roles and vesting schedules. Product success doesn't matter if team implodes.

graveyard.name: HealthCheck AI
graveyard.description: Symptom checker AI for primary healthcare in rural areas.
graveyard.reasonForClosure: Regulatory challenges and liability concerns. Could not get medical device certification or insurance.
graveyard.lessonLearned: Healthcare AI in Africa faces significant regulatory hurdles. Research compliance requirements before building.

graveyard.name: TrafficFlow AI
graveyard.description: AI-powered traffic prediction and optimization for African cities.
graveyard.reasonForClosure: Long government sales cycles and corruption made B2G model impossible. Ran out of runway waiting for deals.
graveyard.lessonLearned: Government contracts in Africa take 18-24 months minimum. Need alternate revenue streams or significantly more runway.
